4CD1.F.summary: Codere, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the private gaming business in Spain, Italy, Argentina, Brazil, Colombia, Mexico, Panama, and Uruguay. It operates amusement and gaming machines, bookmakers, bingo halls, casinos, racetracks, sports betting shops, slot machine rooms and venues, and electronic roulette tables. The company also provides online gaming solutions; and real estate, hospitality, management and business support services. It operates 57,000 slot machines, 30,000 bingo seats and 8,600 sports betting terminals, across various gaming venues, including 149 gaming halls, 1,200 arcades, close to 9,300 bars, 260 sports betting shops, and 4 horse racetracks. Codere, S.A. was founded in 1980 and is headquartered in Alcobendas, Spain.
